request."},"getTransferRequestHash((address,uint256[],address[],uint256))":{"details":"Calculates Keccak-256 hash of the transfer request.","params":{"request":"The request structure."},"return":"Keccak-256 EIP712 hash of the transfer request."},"getWithdrawCrossChainRequestHash((address,uint256,string,address,uint256,uint256))":{"details":"Calculates Keccak-256 hash of the crosschain withdraw request.","params":{"request":"The request structure."},"return":"Keccak-256 EIP712 hash of the crosschain withdraw request."},"pause()":{"details":"Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"unpause()":{"details":"Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state."}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"Pause()":{"notice":"Pause the majority of functionalities of CRCL. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.     * Note that `requestForceWithdraw` and `forceWithdraw` is not subject to pause"},"Resume()":{"notice":"Resume all paused functionalities of Boomflow. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission."},"forceWithdraw(address)":{"notice":"Force withdraw all msg.sender's CRCL token to recipient's ERC20 token. The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.     * Emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn."},"requestForceWithdraw()":{"notice":"Request for a force withdraw of all sender's CRCL token. The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.     * Emits a {ScheduleWithdraw} event indicating the withdraw has been scheduled."},"transferFor((address,uint256[],address[],uint256),bytes)":{"notice":"Transfer tokens from one sender to a list of recipients according to a list of amounts. Only WhitelistAdmin have the access permission. Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.     * Requirements: - `request.userAddress` cannot be zero address. - `request.amounts` and `request.recipients` must have the same length."},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Transfer the amount of token from sender to recipient. Only WhitelistedRoles (WhitelistAdmin, Boomflow) have the access permission. Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.     * Requirements: - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`."},"withdraw((address,uint256,address,bool,uint256),bytes)":{"notice":"Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's ERC777 asset. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission. The function will atomically perform the following operations:     *      1. Validate the user signature     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`     3. Transfer equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address to `request.recipient`     * The ERC777 token emits a {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred. The CRCL token emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.     * Requirements: - The request hash has to be unique. - The `request.isCrosschain` is False."},"withdrawCrossChain((address,uint256,string,address,uint256,uint256),bytes)":{"notice":"Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's crosschain asset. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission. The function will atomically perform the following operations:     *      1. Validate the user signature     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`     3. Burn equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address     * Note that For the full-fledged crosschain withdraw, we are depending on Custodian counterparts to perform the actual crosschain operations     * The ERC777 token emits a {Burned} event indicating the amount withdrawn. The CRCL token emits a {Transfer} to null address event indicating the amount withdrawn.     * Requirements: - The request hash has to be unique. - The `request.isCrosschain` is True."}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/kang/work/nft-dex/boomflow-contract/contracts/crc-l/CRCL.sol":"CRCL"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":1000},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/kang/work/nft-dex/boomflow-contract/contracts/ERC777/ITokenBase.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7568cb63f3592e2b46e645882bac7a94260d09206d368ba9916689be23dc25eb","urls":["bzz-raw://9d16f50dcbcb77a4814be5de12da176bcffec2306a4def84e7907cd2aa2d4aad","dweb:/ipfs/QmfU4m8UMhsan8n7d6xXYTZPcYkDh9VTLEp5GL1NqGgtV1"]},"/Users/kang/work/nft-dex/boomflow-contract/contracts/ERC777/IWrappedCfx.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd7d8777cf6d814f0fefddc2ce29cbd9c4cb6ef036cfa2e1ba638e43b734b1faf","urls":["bzz-raw://4d85fce014869dd472432ba021904aa50b0eccf4f9fe60a3479f2ced986559bf","dweb:/ipfs/QmSe7D97TN2w57gE7XsoPR576ANU48g81ikdUpd5Q8F3AE"]},"/Users/kang/work/nft-dex/boomflow-contract/contracts/boomflow/libs/LibSignatureValidator.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0256e3ab6955091f2e4e05bf6793a29f54d96e72c3da889278a07437eed5c7fe","urls":["bzz-raw://633083843c3de1a7e4cbfbc07a659725d9885e06dea3ea74d9e2124e4b7db125","dweb:/ipfs/QmVoMF5vvj7ApgRQnQ7U3jM2pryU85YsHyzUMPfvkHq73b"]},"/Users/kang/work/nft-dex/boomflow-contract/contracts/crc-l/CRCL.sol":{"keccak256":"0x88a521d4b32bfc8639fa5042c1791bcf174c207f60dbe5a30cd850465f9d3a49","urls":["bzz-raw://d2df9251fc35cbbab7e08b95506fbf099b646bee451719fe458605867c712498","dweb:/ipfs/Qma82J5LP5RGNUZXQVUiRNw5i7y43aaK9upTayP6uaAm8F"]},"/Users/kang/work/nft-dex/boomflow-contract/contracts/crc-l/ICRCL.sol":{"keccak256":"0x56cf4208c680fad06a2f55127cf717a465317aa3eac6559a0cef72b4bbb51f0b","urls":["bzz-raw://1560d8bc1211c9df69460a6e562a7420d1757ae0f7b7c98aeff569780538e609","dweb:/ipfs/QmZr7fVKLLFhqR65mGEJu5TAjvkTSQVRZXPsSAwdXVBtXr"]},"/Users/kang/work/nft-dex/boomflow-contract/contracts/crc-l/TimeLock.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8cf159b968342716eb705ec2caf43224302a5e71b60a6229d5e1e882c784794b","urls":["bzz-raw://4b6314807b6149532a17d3671b137c0ed9fd23b4e516bf6f944bcda2b7a Transfer the amount of token from sender to recipient.
Only WhitelistedRoles (WhitelistAdmin, Boomflow) have the access permission.
Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.
     * Requirements:
- `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address.
- `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`.
nodes.name: transferFrom

nodes.documentation:
Transfer tokens from one sender to a list of recipients according to a list of amounts.
Only WhitelistAdmin have the access permission.
Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.
     * Requirements:
- `request.userAddress` cannot be zero address.
- `request.amounts` and `request.recipients` must have the same length.
nodes.name: transferFor

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance"

arguments.value: CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance"

nodes.documentation:
Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's ERC777 asset.
Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.
The function will atomically perform the following operations:
     *      1. Validate the user signature
     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`
     3. Transfer equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address to `request.recipient`
     * The ERC777 token emits a {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.
The CRCL token emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.
     * Requirements:
- The request hash has to be unique.
- The `request.isCrosschain` is False.
nodes.name: withdraw

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance"

arguments.value: CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance"

nodes.documentation:
Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's crosschain asset.
Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.
The function will atomically perform the following operations:
     *      1. Validate the user signature
     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`
     3. Burn equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address
     * Note that For the full-fledged crosschain withdraw, we are depending
on Custodian counterparts to perform the actual crosschain operations
     * The ERC777 token emits a {Burned} event indicating the amount withdrawn.
The CRCL token emits a {Transfer} to null address event indicating the amount withdrawn.
     * Requirements:
- The request hash has to be unique.
- The `request.isCrosschain` is True.
nodes.name: withdrawCrossChain

nodes.documentation:
Request for a force withdraw of all sender's CRCL token.
The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.
     * Emits a {ScheduleWithdraw} event indicating the withdraw has been scheduled.
nodes.name: requestForceWithdraw

nodes.documentation:
Force withdraw all msg.sender's CRCL token to recipient's ERC20 token.
The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.
     * Emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.
nodes.name: forceWithdraw

nodes.documentation:
Pause the majority of functionalities of CRCL.
Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.
     * Note that `requestForceWithdraw` and `forceWithdraw` is not subject to pause
nodes.name: Pause

nodes.documentation:
Resume all paused functionalities of Boomflow.
Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.
nodes.name: Resume

getRequestHash((address,uint256,address,.details: Calculates Keccak-256 hash of the withdraw request.
getRequestHash((address,uint256,address,.return: Keccak-256 EIP712 hash of the withdraw request.

getTransferRequestHash((address,uint256[.details: Calculates Keccak-256 hash of the transfer request.
getTransferRequestHash((address,uint256[.return: Keccak-256 EIP712 hash of the transfer request.

getWithdrawCrossChainRequestHash((addres.details: Calculates Keccak-256 hash of the crosschain withdraw request.
getWithdrawCrossChainRequestHash((addres.return: Keccak-256 EIP712 hash of the crosschain withdraw request.

pause().details: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.

Pause().notice: Pause the majority of functionalities of CRCL. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.     * Note that `requestForceWithdraw` and `forceWithdraw` is not subject to pause

Resume().notice: Resume all paused functionalities of Boomflow. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.

forceWithdraw(address).notice: Force withdraw all msg.sender's CRCL token to recipient's ERC20 token. The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.     * Emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.

requestForceWithdraw().notice: Request for a force withdraw of all sender's CRCL token. The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.     * Emits a {ScheduleWithdraw} event indicating the withdraw has been scheduled.

transferFor((address,uint256[],address[].notice: Transfer tokens from one sender to a list of recipients according to a list of amounts. Only WhitelistAdmin have the access permission. Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.     * Requirements: - `request.userAddress` cannot be zero address. - `request.amounts` and `request.recipients` must have the same length.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer the amount of token from sender to recipient. Only WhitelistedRoles (WhitelistAdmin, Boomflow) have the access permission. Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.     * Requirements: - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`.

withdraw((address,uint256,address,bool,u.notice: Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's ERC777 asset. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission. The function will atomically perform the following operations:     *      1. Validate the user signature     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`     3. Transfer equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address to `request.recipient`     * The ERC777 token emits a {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred. The CRCL token emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.     * Requirements: - The request hash has to be unique. - The `request.isCrosschain` is False.

withdrawCrossChain((address,uint256,stri.notice: Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's crosschain asset. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission. The function will atomically perform the following operations:     *      1. Validate the user signature     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`     3. Burn equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address     * Note that For the full-fledged crosschain withdraw, we are depending on Custodian counterparts to perform the actual crosschain operations     * The ERC777 token emits a {Burned} event indicating the amount withdrawn. The CRCL token emits a {Transfer} to null address event indicating the amount withdrawn.     * Requirements: - The request hash has to be unique. - The `request.isCrosschain` is True.
